sys_script_include.name: GetEmployeeTaskState

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_de69e6f18346769078c11a30ceaad3cd
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1850706_govsma_0.GetEmployeeTaskState</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>GetEmployeeTaskState</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var GetEmployeeTaskState = Class.create();
GetEmployeeTaskState.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    getDocStatus: function () {

        var requestSysId = this.getParameter('sysparm_request_sys_id');
        if (!requestSysId) {
            return '';
        }

        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_1850706_govsma_0_empl_task');
        gr.addQuery('requester_data', requestSysId); 
        gr.setLimit(1);
        gr.query();

        if (gr.next()) {
            return gr.getValue('state');
        }

        return '';
    },

    type: 'GetEmployeeTaskState'
});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-12-27 02:06:15</sys_created_on><sys_id>de69e6f18346769078c11a30ceaad3cd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetEmployeeTaskState</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GovSmart Review &amp; Visit Management System" source="x_1850706_govsma_0">e0e99de183fdf21078c11a30ceaad3e5</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="GovSmart Review &amp; Visit Management System">e0e99de183fdf21078c11a30ceaad3e5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_de69e6f18346769078c11a30ceaad3cd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-12-27 02:07:57</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
